name: Wilson v. Upper Moreland-Hatboro Joint Sewer Authority, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Wilson v. Upper Moreland-Hatboro Joint Sewer Authority

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
parties: Wilson v. Upper Moreland-Hatboro Joint Sewer Authority, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The Judgment is affirmed on the able opinion of Judge Ervin of the Superior Court, which is reported in 183 Pa. Superior Ct. 588, 133 A. 2d 361.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Edward B. Duffy, with him Samuel H. High, Jr., for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Wilson v. Upper Moreland-Hatboro Joint Sewer Authority, Appellant.
Argued January 6, 1958.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
Edward B. Duffy, with him Samuel H. High, Jr., for appellant.
Conrad C. Moffett, for appellees.
April 21, 1958:
